home.intro: I am a Computer Engineering student who is learning full stack web development and enjoys building real-world projects step by step.

projects.title: Flat Expense Splitter
projects.description: A console-based application to split shared expenses among flatmates and calculate individual balances.

projects.title: Rock Paper Scissors Game
projects.description: A simple game implementation of Rock Paper Scissors to understand basic programming logic and condition handling.

projects.title: Number Guessing Game
projects.description: A game where the user guesses a randomly generated number, built to strengthen loops, conditions, and user input handling.

projects.title: Student Management System
projects.description: A basic system to manage student records such as name, roll number, and marks, focusing on CRUD operations and logic building.

projects.title: Portfolio Website (Express + EJS)
projects.description: A multi-page personal portfolio website built using Express.js and EJS with reusable layouts and data-driven rendering from JSON.
